20110118180557.000|20110118180558.000|CC1|HE HAS REPLACED LARRY KING AND  
20110118180558.000|20110118180601.000|CC1|HE DID A ONE-HOUR INTERVIEW WITH
20110118180601.000|20110118180602.000|CC1|OUR FRIEND OPRAH.

20110118180604.000|20110118180608.000|CC1|WHICH I THINK MAYBE SURPRISED   
20110118180608.000|20110118180610.000|CC1|PEOPLE, SHE TALKED ABOUT LOSING 
20110118180610.000|20110118180612.000|CC1|HER BABY.

20110118180615.000|20110118180617.000|CC1|SHE WAS ONLY 14 YEARS OLD.

20110118180620.000|20110118180620.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:06:00 of 1:00:00
20110118180619.000|20110118180621.000|CC1|THEN WE'LL DISCUSS IT.          
20110118180621.000|20110118180622.000|CC1|>> WHEN THE BABY DIED, THE BABY 
20110118180622.000|20110118180624.000|CC1|WAS NEVER BROUGHT HOME FROM THE 
20110118180624.000|20110118180626.000|CC1|HOSPITAL AND THE BABY DIED.     
20110118180626.000|20110118180627.000|CC1|I KNEW IT WAS MY SECOND CHANCE. 
20110118180627.000|20110118180630.000|CC1|SO I WENT BACK TO SCHOOL AND    
20110118180630.000|20110118180632.000|CC1|NOBODY KNEW.

20110118184503.000|20110118184504.000|CC1|      FOR SUDDEN SYMPTOMS.      
20110118184504.000|20110118184504.000|CC1|       IT IS A COMBINATION      
20110118184504.000|20110118184506.000|CC1|        OF TWO MEDICINES        
20110118184506.000|20110118184506.000|CC1|     AND SHOULD NOT BE TAKEN    
20110118184506.000|20110118184508.000|CC1|   MORE OFTEN THAN PRESCRIBED.  
20110118184508.000|20110118184510.000|CC1| SYMBICORT CONTAINS FORMOTEROL. 
20110118184510.000|20110118184511.000|CC1|    MEDICINES LIKE FORMOTEROL   
20110118184511.000|20110118184511.000|CC1|   INCREASE THE RISK OF DEATH   
20110118184511.000|20110118184513.000|CC1|      FROM ASTHMA PROBLEMS,     
20110118184513.000|20110118184513.000|CC1|  AND CHILDREN AND ADOLESCENTS
